column5: this is pretty awesome, i dont make many posts anymore, but you guys gotta see this.
Wow, thats really creative. Looks great!
I want one, even though I have no clue how to snowboard!

Totally BOSS!!  More of a novelty item than and actual functional product though. Doubt we'll be seeing that at our local board shops...  Side note:  Steve Able actually looks like a nice guy when he's not screaming on the phone to get paid.  LOL
